com.csahmad.moodcloud

Class QueryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.csahmad.moodcloud.QueryBuilder

  • public class QueryBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Build query strings to be used in elasticsearch queries.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public static java.lang.String build(SearchFilter filter,
                                     int resultSize,
                                     int from)
        Return an elasticsearch query reflecting the restrictions in the given filter.
        Parameters:
        filter - the restrictions the query should enforce
        resultSize - the maximum number of results to return
        from - set to 0 to get the first x number of results, set to x to get the next x number of results, set to 2x to get the next x number of results after that, and so on
        Returns:
        an elasticsearch query reflecting the restrictions in the given filter

      • buildTermAggregations

        public static java.lang.String buildTermAggregations(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> fields,
                                                     int resultSize)
        Return a portion of a query indicating the terms in the given fields should be counted.
        Parameters:
        fields - the names of the fields to aggregate
        resultSize - how many values to return the counts of
        Returns:
        a portion of a query indicating the terms in the given fields should be counted

      • buildSortBy

        public static java.lang.String buildSortBy(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> fields,
                                           SortOrder order)
        Return a portion of a query indicating how the results should be sorted.
        Parameters:
        fields - the fields to sort by
        order - the order to sort by
        Returns:
        a portion of a query indicating how the results should be sorted

      • buildNonEmptyFields

        public static java.lang.String buildNonEmptyFields(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> fields)
        Return a portion of a query indicating that the given fields should not be empty in the returned objects.
        Parameters:
        fields - the fields that should not be empty
        Returns:

      • buildExactFieldValues

        public static java.lang.String buildExactFieldValues(java.util.ArrayList<FieldValue> fieldValues)
        Return a portion of a query indicating that certain fields should have certain values.
        Parameters:
        fieldValues - a list of field: value restrictions
        Returns:
        a portion of a query indicating that certain fields should have certain values

      • buildMultiMatch

        public static java.lang.String buildMultiMatch(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> keywords,
                                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> fields)
        Return a portion of a query indicating that any of the given fields should have any of the given keywords.
        Parameters:
        keywords - the keywords to search for
        fields - the fields to search for given the keywords in
        Returns:
        a portion of a query indicating that any of the given fields should have any of the given keywords

      • buildSinceDate

        public static java.lang.String buildSinceDate(int timeUnitsAgo,
                                              java.lang.String timeUnits,
                                              java.lang.String dateField)
        Return a portion of a query indicating that the returned objects should not be older than the given date/time restriction.
        Parameters:
        timeUnitsAgo - the maximum amount of timeUnits ago a returned object can be dated it
        timeUnits - the time units (eg. "w" for weeks)
        dateField - the field that contains the object's date
        Returns:
        a portion of a query indicating that the returned objects should not be older than the given date/time restriction

      • buildGeoDistance

        public static java.lang.String buildGeoDistance(SimpleLocation location,
                                                double maxDistance,
                                                java.lang.String locationField,
                                                java.lang.String units)
        Return a portion of a query indicating that the returned objects should be within the given distance of the given location.
        Parameters:
        location - the location to measure the distance from
        maxDistance - the maximum distance a returned object can be
        locationField - the name of the object's location field
        units - the units of maxDistance (eg. "km")
        Returns:
        a portion of a query indicating that the returned objects should be within the given distance of the given location
